sent.orig: Unlike Object-Oriented Middleware, which is based on method invocation or RPC, MOM utilizes asynchronous communication.
sent.trans: 不像面向对象的中间件，它是基于方法调用或RPC,MOM采用异步通讯。

sent.orig: MOM can be thought of as merging two once distinct technologies: messaging and queuing.
sent.trans: MOM可以看作是过去两种不同技术的结合：消息传递与排队。

sent.orig: Typically, synchronous communication is implemented by RPC-style communication infrastructures, while asynchronous mechanisms are implemented by MOM.
sent.trans: 一般而言，同步机制由RPC实现，而异步机制由MOM实现。当然，这不是绝对的。

sent.orig: Today, the difference between MOM and OOM is not so obvious.
sent.trans: 今天，MOM和OOM之间的不同不是那么明显。

sent.orig: Messaging-oriented middleware (MOM) broadly describes the technical means used to achieve BQM.
sent.trans: 面向消息的中间件(MOM)广义上描述了用于获得BQM的技术手段。
